routing

Class ProphetV2Router

  • java.lang.Object
    • routing.MessageRouter
      • routing.ActiveRouter
        • routing.ProphetV2Router

  • public class ProphetV2Router
extends ActiveRouter
    Implementation of PRoPHETv2" router as described in http://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-irtf-dtnrg-prophet-09

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  ProphetV2Router.TupleComparator
      Comparator for Message-Connection-Tuples that orders the tuples by their delivery probability by the host on the other side of the connection (GRTRMax)

      • SECONDS_IN_UNIT_S

        public static final java.lang.String SECONDS_IN_UNIT_S
        Number of seconds in time unit -setting id ("secondsInTimeUnit"). How many seconds one time unit is when calculating aging of delivery predictions. Should be tweaked for the scenario.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • BETA_S

        public static final java.lang.String BETA_S
        Transitivity scaling constant (beta) -setting id ("beta"). Default value for setting is DEFAULT_BETA.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • changedConnection

        public void changedConnection(Connection con)
        Description copied from class: ActiveRouter
        Called when a connection's state changes. If energy modeling is enabled, and a new connection is created to this node, reduces the energy for the device discovery (scan response) amount
        Overrides:
        changedConnection in class ActiveRouter
        Parameters:
        con - The connection that changed

      • updateDeliveryPredFor

        private void updateDeliveryPredFor(DTNHost host)
        Updates delivery predictions for a host. P(a,b) = P(a,b)_old + (1 - P(a,b)_old) * PEnc PEnc(intvl) = P_encounter_max * (intvl / I_typ) for 0<= intvl <= I_typ P_encounter_max for intvl > I_typ
        Parameters:
        host - The host we just met

      • getEncTimeFor

        public double getEncTimeFor(DTNHost host)
        Returns the timestamp of the last encouter of with the host or -1 if entry for the host doesn't exist.
        Parameters:
        host - The host to look the timestamp for
        Returns:
        the last timestamp of encouter with the host

      • getPredFor

        public double getPredFor(DTNHost host)
        Returns the current prediction (P) value for a host or 0 if entry for the host doesn't exist.
        Parameters:
        host - The host to look the P for
        Returns:
        the current P value

      • updateTransitivePreds

        private void updateTransitivePreds(DTNHost host)
        Updates transitive (A->B->C) delivery predictions. P(a,c) = P(a,c)_old + (1 - P(a,c)_old) * P(a,b) * P(b,c) * BETA
        Parameters:
        host - The B host who we just met

      • ageDeliveryPreds

        private void ageDeliveryPreds()
        Ages all entries in the delivery predictions. P(a,b) = P(a,b)_old * (GAMMA ^ k), where k is number of time units that have elapsed since the last time the metric was aged.
        See Also:
        SECONDS_IN_UNIT_S

      • getDeliveryPreds

        private java.util.Map<DTNHost,java.lang.Double> getDeliveryPreds()
        Returns a map of this router's delivery predictions
        Returns:
        a map of this router's delivery predictions

      • update

        public void update()
        Description copied from class: ActiveRouter
        Checks out all sending connections to finalize the ready ones and abort those whose connection went down. Also drops messages whose TTL <= 0 (checking every one simulated minute).
        Overrides:
        update in class ActiveRouter
        See Also:
        ActiveRouter.addToSendingConnections(Connection)
